classroom.name: h1
classroom.style: color: white; font-size: 56px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 2px; line-height: 58px; margin: 0;

classroom.name: button1
classroom.style: align-items: center; border: none; color: white; display: flex; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; height: 48px; justify-content: center; letter-spacing: 1px; max-width: 160px; text-decoration: none; width: 100%;

classroom.name: cart-product-container-item
classroom.style: align-items: center; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; width: 100%;

classroom.name: cart-product-container-item-product-div-section
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-div
classroom.style: align-items: center; background-color: #F1F1F1; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; max-width: 120px; min-height: 100%; width: 100%;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-div2
classroom.style: align-items: center; background-color: #F1F1F1; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; max-width: 96px; min-height: 32px; width: 100%;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-buttons
classroom.style: border: none; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.25); cursor: pointer; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 1px; margin-inline: 12.5px; transition: 150ms;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-buttons2
classroom.style: border: none; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.25); cursor: pointer; font-family: Manrope, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 1px; margin-inline: 6px; transition: 150ms;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-input
classroom.style: background-color: transparent; border: none; font-family: Manrope; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 1px; margin: 0; outline: none; padding: 0; text-align: center; width: 40px;
